show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #84 Kevin Deleu "Back to Brazil"
subtitle: #84 Kevin Deleu "Back to Brazil"
summary:
My friend Kevin Deleu joins me on Zoom just after a trip to South America to talk about his observations. We talk about his registered Angus herd, how he got started in the Brahma seedstock business and why he transitioned.
Two of our friends get shout outs, I talk about some of my water systems and we talk about how to define regenerative ag and a whole lot more!

https://www.deleuranch.net/
